Bailu app is a setup tool and scanner for Movesense party app. The sensors measure your activity to come up with a party level, which it will advertise via bluetooth along with other partying related info. When scanning, Bailu app recognizes nearby sensors showing their party status.

The app automatically forces updates on non compatible sensor software. You can choose between two versions. In both versions the led blinks every 10 seconds indicating that the sensor is on. If not scanning parties the sensor turns off after few minutes. The sensors do NOT turn off if their tabs remain connected. The overall pad keeps the sensor on.

Bailu2000B is primarily meant for usage without Bailu app. It automatically turns starts seeking parties when turned on, and refreshes the one hour timer when the tabs are connected or disconnected. The led blinks when this happens. High enough party score also refreshes the time.

Bailu2000A is only controlled with the setup tool in Bailu app, which helps save battery. This also allows for continuous party metering for up to 24 hours without touching the sensor. Bailu2000A can also use online settings configured for the season.

The battery life is probably around 60 h when scanning.

If your device fails to find your movesense, try "forget device" from the side menu.
